
#### Summary Table

```{r sum_tab}
# Summarise the variable at the halfway point in the simulation.
tab <- df %>%
  filter(time == round(max(time) / 2)) %>%
  summarise(Minimum = min(.data[[var]]),
            `25th Percentile` = quantile(.data[[var]], probs = 0.25),
            Median = median(.data[[var]]),
            Mean = mean(.data[[var]]),
            `75th Percentile` = quantile(.data[[var]], probs = 0.75),
            Maximum = max(.data[[var]]))
  
tab %>%
  kbl(caption = paste("Summary of", var, "at the halfway point in the simulation.")) %>%
  kable_classic(full_width = F, html_font = "Cambria")

```

#### Distribution

```{r sum_dist}

df %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = .data[[var]])) +
  geom_density(fill = "slateblue", alpha = 0.80) +
  ylab("Density") +
  theme_bw() 

```
